  "mobily-acl:mobily-acl": {
    "acl-services": [
      {
        "acl-service-name": "BC-A",

          {
            "site-name": "ADAM",

{
  "mobily-acl:mobily-acl": {
    "acl-services": [
      {
        "acl-service-name": "BC-A",
        "sites": [
          {
            "site-name": "ADAM",
            "devices": [
              {
                "device-name": "NETSIM-ADAM-WSER-CI-001",
                "access-lists": [
                  {
                    "access-list-name": "ADMA-SR-ALL-IN-BC-A",

  "mobily-acl:mobily-acl": {
    "acl-services": [
      {
